model_code:
def longest_palindrome(s: str) -> str:
    max_length = 1
    max_substring = s[0]
    n = len(s)
    
    for i in range(n):
        # Case 1: Expand around s[i] (single character center)
        l, r = i, i
        while l >= 0 and r < n and s[l] == s[r]:
            length = r - l + 1
            if length > max_length:
                max_length = length
                max_substring = s[l:r+1]
            l -= 1
            r += 1
        
        # Case 2: Expand around s[i] and s[i+1] (two characters center)
        l, r = i, i + 1
        while l >= 0 and r < n and s[l] == s[r]:
            length = r - l + 1
            if length > max_length:
                max_length = length
                max_substring = s[l:r+1]
            l -= 1
            r += 1
    
    return max_substring
